collection-target.influx-query: SELECT assetId, assetLabel, customerId, datname, pg_stat_database_tup_deleted, pg_stat_database_tup_fetched, pg_stat_database_tup_inserted,pg_stat_database_tup_returned, pg_stat_database_tup_updated, pg_locks_count, pg_stat_database_deadlocks, pg_stat_database_xact_commit, pg_stat_database_xact_rollback, pg_stat_database_numbackends,pg_stat_database_blks_hit, pg_stat_database_blks_read FROM PostgreSQL WHERE assetId='__ASSET_ID__' AND time > now() - 10m
